name: Agathocles / The Kurws 5" split
description:
Five-inch split single by Belgian grind-core veterans and punk "big-band" from Poland. Lo-Fi sound meets the sound which is even more Lo-Fi, blast beats vs syncopation on the floor tom, saxophones and clarinets vs growl, rough guitar vs acid sound of the synthesizer. Due to the unusual vinyl format both bands try to keep it brief. While Kurws play one piece a little bit more than two minutes long, Agathocles fits four short ones. Both sides of the release are dedicated to the problems of Intellectual Property, freedom of access goods and freedom itself.
The single is packed in a simple cover and a fold-out booklet with collages in color and an extensive quotation by Erich Fromm.

name: Massgrave / Suffering Mind 9'' + DVD
description:
New tracks on both sides! Canada v/s. Poland.
Split on tape presented on their concert played together in Wroclaw, 16.IX.2012.

name: Suffering Mind / Massgrave
description:
Black tape, silver cover - 100 limit

New tracks on both sides! Canada v/s. Poland.
Split on tape presented on their concert played together in Wroclaw, 16.IX.2012.

This tape is also a preview of 9'' vinyl by those bands, which will
soon appear under colours of Behind the Mountain Records.

name: Phobia / Suffering Mind 5" (Black & Yellow)
description:
Strictly limited to
- black vinyl (limited to 172 copies) + two embroider patches, hidden
inside gatefold cover. Available only at Behind the Mountain Records.

- yellow vinyl (limited to 494 copies), in nice gatefold cover as well.

Long awaited splits of two know gXc crews.
Phobia is proving, that after 20 years on scene they are still in
great shape and featured track is a great supplement to their new LP.
Suffering Mind without any complexes is reeving to absolute first
league with another awesome material.
Without any comments - absolute must have in any grindcore music archive ;-)

Strictly limited to
- black vinyl (limited to 172 copies) + two embroider patches, hidden
inside gatefold cover. Available only at Behind the Mountain Records.

- yellow vinyl (limited to 494 copies), in nice gatefold cover as well.
